name: PotatoNotes
description: POSP official notes application, written in flutter, beautiful, fast and secure.  Main features: - Online sync - List/grid view for notes - Multiple note extras, such as lists, images and remainders - Lock notes with a pin or password for hiding them on main menu - Search notes for content/title with various filters - Complete theme personalization - Archive and trash for notes - Offline backup/restore functionality  The app is also completely open source! Propose changes, open issues and clone the code from https://github.com/HrX03/PotatoNotes.  If you wanna get the latest news, be sure to join the telegram channel on t.me/potatonotesnews, instead if you want to chat join the group t.me/potatonotes
